Event.Name: OnDropFiles
Event.Desc: Fires when the user has dropped files into the client area of the control.
Event.Note: Accept files property must be set to true in order to this event to work.

Arg.Name: TabControl
Arg.Desc: Handle of the control that fires this event.

Arg.Name: FilesTable
Arg.Desc: A numerically indexed table that contains paths of dropped files.

Return.Desc: No return value expected for this event.

Event.Name: OnSelChange
Event.Desc: Fires when the selection has changed in a tab control.

Arg.Name: TabControl
Arg.Desc: Handle of the control that fires this event.

Arg.Name: Selected Item
Arg.Desc: One-based index of the selected item in the tab control.

Return.Desc: No return value expected for this event.
